website_summaries.verdict: A solid little biometric safe that can be anchored to the floor and stores a decent number of unique fingerprints.
pros: Biometric and a pin code override function
Fingerprint reading function works reliably even when your finger is in different positions
cons: This is not a heavy safe
If you do not have it bolted to a floor or wall it could be easily carried off

website_summaries.verdict: This sturdy bio-metric safe can hold several small guns securely, and is offered at a good price.
pros: High quality safe and the bio-metrics
Can store several pistols as well as other valuables
Key backup for when batteries die
Can be mounted to the floor
Warning beeper alerts if the door is left open
cons: This safe is not very heavy and could be carried off if not mounted properly

customer_reviews.title: then you need to get a better safe. This works for my purposes
customer_reviews.text: At this price, you get what you pay for. If you have extremely valuable things that you need to store, then you need to get a better safe. This works for my purposes. You have to take extra measures to secure it. It's not heavy and someone could just carry it off to crack later. I have a shelf built up against a closed that I use for this. I bolted it to a shelf and then framed it in, just making it that much more difficult to get into to steal. It works well, is easy to set up, and is pretty secure. You'll need to bolt it down to something at the bare minimum
customer_reviews.author: Diffy

customer_reviews.title: defective on delivery - door jammed closed and was unable to open
customer_reviews.text: I received the safe and opened it with the key to commence initial setup. After closing the safe the first time (after installing batteries), I was unable to reopen the safe either by using the code or by using the key. The key would turn, and after using the code it would look like it was unlocking, but the door remained shut and would not open. I finally turned the key to open it and then tried prying it open further with a screw driver and was able to get it open. Somehow it was jammed (even after unlocking via the key). I have returned this safe. What is the point of a safe where you cannot open it reliably???
customer_reviews.author: Kintaro

customer_reviews.title: They don't test.
customer_reviews.text: Received a safe that didn't respond as the manual said it should. After reading other reviews I decided to try opening it up. I immediately noticed the contact sensor for "closed" didn't quite make it, so the thing just closed and opened without ever locking. I bent the arm, and whala a functioning safe. This is stupid simple. I emailed support before I did this, and I'll report back if they make this good. All 1-star feature reviews are just because if the core function of a safe (locking) doesn't work... well it's not a safe now is it?
customer_reviews.author: DCrane

customer_reviews.title: Great option for a smaller safe!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice safe...well constructed and durable. Set up was easy, and the finger print reader works well. One thought, take multiple impressions of your finger. That way, it doesn't matter how your finger rests on the scanner, it will pick up the image. You can also use a code of you want to. Love the lit interior too!
customer_reviews.author: maxgsp2015

customer_reviews.title: Key lock inoperative, am returning!
customer_reviews.text: First step in setup was to unlock safe using the supplied keys. Neither key worked, tried jiggling the key, etc. Amazon is sending replacement safe. I received the replacement safe, the set up went perfectly. The key worked, programming new pin code and storing fingerprints for both myself and wife was easy by following the clear and plain instructions. Therefore, I have upgraded my rating to four stars. I wish there was backlighting on the keypad. Very nice safe!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Olson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the risk. Good price. Can't rely on this to function properly.
customer_reviews.text: I took a gamble because I like Viking products and this was affordable. This is just a cheap imitation of leading safes. Any code will unlock the safe. Even to a point where pushing "*" will unlock it. I have troubleshooted and factory reset multiple times. Just not the quality is expect from a Viking. If you're reading this. Don't make the mistake I did. Go spend more money on quality because that safe will last you. I'm returning to spend an additional $100 on a safe I know I can rely on.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Masters

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Worth what I paid.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like this will do the trick for what I need it for. The biometric scanner and I have a love/hate relationship. Mostly hate. It worked when I programmed it and hasn’t read a fingerprint since. I’ll try reprogramming it again at some point, but not sure it’ll pan out. I like the shelf and the interior light. The exterior is so dark that I have to keep a flashlight by the safe to see the pin pad. It’d be nice for it to have some way to see the keypad in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Johns

customer_reviews.title: Quality control lacking
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this safe and after 5 minutes of use the biometric scanner and keypad stopped working. I called the company. I missed their call and thus called back and left email address. They sent me some instructions on remedies to the problem. Nothing worked. They sent out another safe. This one worked but the LCD was missing several characters. They offered to send another safe, but I declined. Would hate for the safe to fail at a crucial moment. Great price and response from company was good but quality control severally lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Working great so far.
customer_reviews.text: Working great so far. Easy to install and set up. Will see how long the finger print and digital keypad hold up. Can comfortably stow two handguns, for me a large 6" barrel model and a compact, plus clips, and maybe an ammo box on the top shelf. My one regret is that the bolt-screws on the bottom plate (to afix it to the floor) can scratch my guns if not careful. Ended up covering the metal screw heads with masking tape to provide softer contact.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Suastegui

customer_reviews.title: Best biometric at this price
customer_reviews.text: Built like a Brickhouse! Serious bolts that are pry proof. Doesn't skimp on quality. 25 lbs! I put furniture pads under mine. I also added a 1.5x6mm tritium vial "order on Amazon", Pay attention to size! A little bead of superglue is all I needed. Yes they are fragile, don't bash them into anything, otherwise they will illuminate 20+ years without a light source needed to charge them! It's perfect for marking in pitch black. I used it to mark the button I need to press on my safe to activate the fingerprint reader.
customer_reviews.author: A. J.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice safe.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case. Say's it doesn't work well for us older folks (Fingerprint issue) 78years and it work first time about 60% of the time. Wish a larger model had the motor driven bolts. The led light is really nice. Feature for turning the audio on and off is flaky. (11/12/2018) Update on the fingerprint scanner: read that it doesn't work too well for seniors which is true but I find that if I wet my finger (mouth is handy if fingers are clean) then wipe it dry on my pant leg it works more reliably.
customer_reviews.author: Niles

customer_reviews.title: Happy with mine.
customer_reviews.text: I can't say whether this safe can hold up to a break-in, but so far it performs exactly as described. I open mine multiple times per day and haven't had any issues. I've also tested mine with unregistered fingerprints and it seems very accurate (only my prints will open it). The interior space is decent and fits my needs - a pistol and tactile flashlight, some important files/cards and a few pill bottles all fit with room to spare and I'm confident getting any of these items out quickly (if necessary) wouldn't be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: 🇺🇸 PATRIOT 🇺🇲

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SIZE
customer_reviews.text: This home safe is the perfect size for a home office. It is large enough to hold important papers, cash and jewelry. The directions were easy to follow. This is a "serious" safe and it is heavy, which is good. I bolted it to a shelf unit using the included hardware. I have already recommenced this safe to a friend and I recommend it to you too.
customer_reviews.author: Carole McCune

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great safe!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this safe! I was skeptical at first to buy a safe on Amazon which I could not see in person, but I am very happy with my purchase. The safe is very sturdy, seems to be made from quality materials. The fingerprint reader and keypad both have worked great so far, and are easy to set up. As with other reviews, I did notice a chip on the back, but it was minor, and since I have the safe bolted to the wall, it was no big deal. Overall, an excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MPLJR1222

customer_reviews.title: Junk!  Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I've never been able to use this as it is very easy to break in. The key works , but if you are using the wrong digital code; all you have to do is push the # key and the door opens. Yes, I did call the safe company, but they asked me to try and fix it by dis assembling the safe. So this safe just sits in my closet taking up space. Please don't purchase anything from this company. Poor quality and poor customer service. Thanks Viking!
customer_reviews.author: jimmy149

customer_reviews.title: ok safe not more then that. you get what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: Its Good safe not great safe but only good . You get what you paid for ,I I had to order it twice actually because the first one came with very rusty door. The silver handle is not align with the door body which makes it look stupid the inside plastic compounds are very cheep made and very cheep Design like the battery housing and light housing
customer_reviews.author: Eric BSB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This is a great safe with plenty of room for 2 pistols, magazines, some ammo, and a few other random things. Instructions were easy to follow too. I liked their suggestion of adding multiple fingerprint angles to ensure ease of access no matter how you hold your finger(s). I've never had a problem gaining access plus there is a pin code as well if needed.
customer_reviews.author: ALX

customer_reviews.title: Great Bargain, Great Safe
customer_reviews.text: Like many others I bought this safe to secure my ruger pistol. The research I did prior to the purchase suggested this safe was a notch above others in its price range. After 6 months I heartily concur. The finger print reader has proven accurate 100% of the time and will not respond to various non-programmed prints, mine or others I've invited to try. It's carpeted interior and interior light are great touches. At this point I've removed the shelf and crammed it with two guns, a 25 lb bag of silver, some cash, and a few other valuables. I obviously have great faith in the integrity of this item. It's solid and secure.
customer_reviews.author: dmc

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and works great
customer_reviews.text: I found this safe to be very sturdy and well put together. There was no problems with the programming of it and the fingerprint passcode works great. This is definitely what I was looking for without spending a ton of money. I will recommend purchasing one if you don’t want to spend an arm and a leg and know that your guns/valuables are safe.
customer_reviews.author: Bigrudd

customer_reviews.title: Works Great and Solid Safe!
customer_reviews.text: I very much appreciate the addition of a keypad as well as keyed entry in case the biometric doesn’t work. I followed the recommendation of others to program the same finger in slightly different angles and I have had great success with gaining consistent access using the biometric scanner. If you plan to put in a vertical (foam) pistol rack note that you likely will have to take the shelf out which was fine for me. Overall a great product at this price point!
customer_reviews.author: Chris G

customer_reviews.title: BAD CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: No phone number for customer service / No response from customer service Shelf clips are made of cheap plastic and broken upon arrival. Bought several from them but no more. Switching to a different safe vendor Overall the fingerprint reader works well and safe is ok overall. God forbid you have a problem though.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne T Grider

customer_reviews.title: Perfect budget safe to hold your guns
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received was damaged in shipping. I was promptly refunded and I reordered another one. For the price, you can't beat it. I use the safe to hold my two pistols. It clearly has enough room to hold a 40mm and a pocket 380 on top shelf and several boxes of ammo, plus magazines underneath. The finger scanner has worked flawlessly for the two months I've had the safe.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: High quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: researched quite a few of these safes. Many are easy to break into, some are easy as using a straw!! This viking seemed to be immune to all of the tricks found on youtube. Fingerprint reader once setup works flawlessly. It asks you to do 7-10 different positions of each finger. Then it has multiple users. We use it to hold a compact 9mm 1911 style and a full size 1911. still have room for flashlights and 1-2 magazines. I would buy this again, or recommend this to family..
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Costumer Service for Viking is the best
customer_reviews.text: When I got my first date of didn’t work, but I emailed Viking and they were super helpful with everything, at first they emailed me a video on what to check and when that didn’t work they sent me a new one that works so perfectly. Costumer service for Viking is just amazing they helped me fast took about a week to get everything switched ( partly because I work a lot) I highly suggest getting this safe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if this is due to a bad design since it should have a small door to ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the safe last week. The key pad and the fingerprint reader did not function. I replaced the batteries thinking that it was due to the batteries that were provided with the unit but the new batteries did not make a difference. Additionally, the batteries would fall out of the compartment they are installed in. Not sure if this is due to a bad design since it should have a small door to keep the batteries in place or whether this was a previously used safe and the door was broken off. Very disappointed. I am now looking into returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Laurinaitis

customer_reviews.title: easy safe
customer_reviews.text: this safe is a breeze to use. don't like the cheap expandable fasteners, but at least they provided something. I drilled a couple of holes through the bottom to better secure it to a shelf as well as to the back side through some studs. It's perfect size for some documents and small valuables & easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ekim

customer_reviews.title: Great safe
customer_reviews.text: I needed a smaller safe for my bedroom closet so I could get to my things easier than going to our big safe. We mounted it to the wall of my closet. So convenient. Easy to use. I lost my key and the customer service was great to work with. Highly recommend this safe
customer_reviews.author: Alice S.

customer_reviews.title: Great safe
customer_reviews.text: Excellent safe. Never had one issue with the finger scanner. That’s all I use to open it. Probably a 2 second delay from when you scan your finger to it fully retracting and opening. Lights up well inside. Excellent safe for a couple hand guns or small personal belongings
customer_reviews.author: Rex

customer_reviews.title: Great experience
customer_reviews.text: Working with Viking was a completely positive experience. From ordering, to the safe arriving quickly, to the SUPER fast responses from the company when we had questions - everything was great. The safe is very nice, high quality and perfect for the valuables we plan to use it for. great size if you have a handgun or similar sized item. Highly recommended company and product. Thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Auerbach

customer_reviews.title: Viking safes not for me.
customer_reviews.text: The first safe would open no matter what combination I used. I sent it back and was really impressed with how fast Amazon responded and sent a second one. Well, it does the exact same thing. This time it would work and then a few minutes later it would not. The light switch on the second one also appears to be defective. Viking safes gets a big fat zero from me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good balance of weight, security, and access
customer_reviews.text: Made in China is always a concern for quality. But Viking did this right. First open is by using a concealed key. Then you can register 32 Fingerprints and changed the one PIN. Each method worked flawlessly including the fingerprint reader for an 80+ year old. It's 30# weight makes it difficult to discreetly move (steal.) You can also bolt it to a wall with the hardware provided.
customer_reviews.author: Steven W.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Safe is a good size, the shelf really helps with that. Nice and heavy. Good quality. Most of the time I do not have a problem with opening it but sometimes it takes longer than I would want for it to recognize my fingerprint. Usually 1/10 times it’ll give me an error. This could be very concerning for someone in an emergency situation.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Foster

customer_reviews.title: I keep this safe next to my bed with a handgun, cash and personal items in it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. the Biometric (finger print reader) works great. I keep this safe next to my bed with a handgun, cash and personal items in it. this safe is made in china and sold by many different manufactures. but I'm ok with that. It does what I need it to do. I'm happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: wreckitralph

customer_reviews.title: Good for gunsafe
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a gunsafe. Multiple holes for bolting it down. I like how there is also a keyhole behind the plate and the key is a 4 sided one. I wish the fingerprint sensor was a bit better (my phone never fails and it is smaller tech) since I've logged in multiple prints.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Neckbeard

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and very reliable safe
customer_reviews.text: So I needed a safe to put documents my jewelry and money in something reliable and safe.. also something advance to use and keyless.. you won't regret buying this product very easy to use Easy to install your finger and passcode...
customer_reviews.author: Rayson Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Best in its class.
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built and heavy. Fingerprint scanner works every time. Only issue is that it’s somewhat easy to carry away. So it shouldn’t be left out in the open and it should be bolted down if you store valuables.
customer_reviews.author: Franco B.

customer_reviews.title: Great safe; poor packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I want to say that the quality of this safe is superb. With that said, the reason for the low review is because the quality of the package it is shipped in is very poor. In my case the item came damaged and missing parts due to a rip in the shoe box quality box. The item weight is well over 20+ pounds, therefore; better protection for the unit is needed.
customer_reviews.author: gio7290

customer_reviews.title: Fit in closet built in shoe rack like it was made for it
customer_reviews.text: High quality safe with biometrics that work. Store 5 pistols on top shelf with room for some papers and jewelry on the bottom. Fit in closet built in shoe rack like it was made for it. Bolted it to the back wall so it's not going anywhere! Very secure!!
customer_reviews.author: Nick K

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Had already purchased the largest version Viking Safe and absolutely love it. It did come with a minor blemish from shipping but Viking was definitely willing to compensate for it. When I bought the new smaller one it still exceeded my expectations. Great safes and great customer care team.
customer_reviews.author: E. Prine

customer_reviews.title: Leave key in
customer_reviews.text: Just a heads up to everyone. The instructions does not tell you to leave the key in on step two to program your new fingerprints.
customer_reviews.author: ZERK22

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality and was forced to send back. Electronics were bad and of poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: RCB, Jr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This safe is absolutely perfect for it's intended purpose. The valuables that I own very easily fit into this safe and allows easy access to the ones needed to be brought out to admire.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little safe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this safe a few weeks back & I am really happy with it. works every time. I don't understand why their was so many neg. reviews. For the price, this is a good quality safe. the light is a real plus also.
customer_reviews.author: D.H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice safe for household items.
customer_reviews.text: Would definitely recommend, finger print reader works well and when secured to the wall or shelf (hardware included) is very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: In love with it after 18 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought it a few months ago and I am over 60. It reads my fingerprints perfectly every single time. I love it and I highly recommend it! Update 18 months later: I wish my iPhone 8 could read my fingerprints as well as this safe. And I am 60+
customer_reviews.author: Fer

customer_reviews.title: Great little safe. Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great little safe! The finger print scanner works perfectly! Nicely secures to the wall or floor.
customer_reviews.author: lildewd77

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprint reader did not work.
customer_reviews.text: Fingerprint reader did not work. The fingerprint Reader took my imprint but the reader Did not recognize my fingerprint to open safe. There was a note on the directions the people over 55 should not use the fingerprint because I guess the fingerprints are not that viable. I tried my 10-year-old grandson in the return did not turn out any better than Mine did.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Podhaski

customer_reviews.title: Finger print scanner may not work for everyone even younger person
customer_reviews.text: Like some other users, I also find the finger print scan to be iffy. At first it worked, but then it started to fail all the time. I redo the set up, it worked, and then it failed the next time I tried. I am way younger than the 55 year old warning, may be I just have light finger print, but my iphone finger print scanner works all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Won't lock and can't reset
customer_reviews.text: Stopped being able to lock safe after a few days. Reset button didn't work. This happened twice - during initial setup and a week later. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: kcflex

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but a malfunctioning, pain in the a-
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this safe to store my medications, as some of them very dangerous should my babies try to consume them. After following all instructions, setting up 20 versions of finger prints, and selecting the PIN, I've been forced to remove the batteries and just use the keys. BECAUSE when it is secured, anyone can walk by and press the '#' button, and BLOOP. It's open. No finger print or PIN required. I'm furious. A safe that heavy is a pain in the first place, but forcing our sweet mail lady deal with an exchange just sucks. Any ideas on how to fix this flaw?
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Item was defective shortly after setting it up
customer_reviews.text: After setting up the codes and fingerprints, the safe kept acting as if it was still unlocked although it was locked. Regardless of what button I pressed the locking bolts would cycle... I am working on an exchange and will update.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome on my nightstand!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this safe for about four months and love it. Fits my full-sized Glock and Kimber with room for a few other small items. It's sturdy and I really like the multiple fingerprints you can code in. I haven't had it not open for me on the first try. Battery life is good as well. I haven't had to replace the batteries yet and I am in and out of it daily. I have already recommended it to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Locking mechanism poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Although the safe itself is well made (metal construction of box) the keypad and key lock are of poor quality. I read the directions for setup numerous times and could not get the keypad to reset, had no problem with the fingerprint scanner seemed to work fine. The key lock started to become loose and was having a hard time getting the key in. Called the company and could only get voicemail, taking it back to UPS for refund!
customer_reviews.author: William Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Well made, opens with fingerprint scanner in a couple of seconds. If you scan your fingerprint enough times upon setup of the safe, there will be no issues recognizing the fingerprint. It hasn't failed to open for me yet. I use this to store a compact pistol (Sig M11-A1), 2 additional mags, and several boxes of rounds. There is room for more storage still.
customer_reviews.author: BrandonWB

customer_reviews.title: Not really Biometric.
customer_reviews.text: The key cover needs to be located in a different place. When I opened the safe the cover dented the edge of the lid because it is poorly placed. The biometric print reader isn't usable. There's just no way I would ever trust that in an emergency, it's very hit and miss, and mostly miss. Because of this, I would say the safe is over-priced. However, it's the only one of its kind that has good battery life and quiet entry. So they should drop the biometric and move the key cover and lower the price a bit, then it would be an excellent safe.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, great product, great service
customer_reviews.text: Safe arrived after only 1.5 days. It's larger Than I expected, and very nice. The interior light did come defective, but the seller immediately sent a new one, free of charge.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Jerome

customer_reviews.title: JUST WHAT I WANTED.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what i was looking for. It is as described . Very well made. The only issue I had were the original directions that come with the safe. I cant begin to describe how bad they were. But i used the phone number that came with the paperwork .They were really nice and very helpful. They emailed the new directions and in minutes I was on my way. Its amazingly simple to get the safe set up and mounted on the wall or floor. It shipped fast and was actually a day sooner than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Wilow40

customer_reviews.title: but this is nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I ignored the age warnings being 62 and all. It can be problematic when opening with fingerprints but works if hands very clean. Lots of room for my 2 pistols and 8 boxes of ammunition. Keep a loaded shot gun by the bed for security, but this is nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: linderunit

customer_reviews.title: Must have for kids!
customer_reviews.text: I keep 2 handguns, multiple knives, and important documents in this thing. It is worth the extra money because it is SOLID! It is crafted very well and is sturdy, not the thin junk models you see for less. This is well worth the money! The finger print reader is easy to use. Just read the instructions!
customer_reviews.author: MyersOnFire

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: Buy this safe it is awesome and strong. With a bonus light inside. The customer service is outstanding. They went above and beyond to help me. That alone makes me a customer for life. Thank you Mai :)
customer_reviews.author: Raskel

customer_reviews.title: Safe doesnt work. push a button and it opens ...
customer_reviews.text: Safe doesnt work. push a button and it opens, without codes or fingerprint scan. Issue with safe, appearently it is fixable, but you have to go through a over the phone procedure to get it done(you fix it with their help). Why not just issue a recall and fix them?
customer_reviews.author: Eric N. Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Love this safe
customer_reviews.text: Love this safe. Futs perfect in a drawer and it's easy to program. Just wish I could disable the beeping when it isn't locked
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Anne

customer_reviews.title: Nice Safe
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this for a few years now and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: JFINN

customer_reviews.title: Great safe, great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Nice safe, great customer service! I received this safe and the fingerprint reader would not work, after further inspection I realized it was damaged in transit. The customer service semi me one out and the new one works great. Room enough for 3 pistols, magazines, and speed loaders. Multiple fingerprint scans on as many fingers as you please (up to 13). Fantastic product, I would definitely recommend this safe to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: Great safe and value
customer_reviews.text: Great safe and value. The keypad recently stopped working and the customer support rep, Siana helped me to resolve the problem quickly and trouble-free. I am happy with the purchase and extremely happy with Siana's customer service. Great customer service! Thank you, Siana. I would recommend this product and should I need another safe in the future, I will look to Viking Security Safe.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Yi

customer_reviews.title: Does not lock, does not work
customer_reviews.text: Does not work, does not lock, very unhappy with with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, finger print reader works without fault I feel what I'm keeping in it is very secure very very happy with this purchase big enough to hold all of my meds on the bottom plus have plenty of rooom for.all my important documents.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work correctly
customer_reviews.text: Every time I use the fingerprint scanner and open it and go to lock it you can press any button afterwards and it opens you have to completely close it then open it back up then punch in your code otherwise it will not lock
customer_reviews.author: Mason Ray

customer_reviews.title: but it holds up to like 30 entries so if you do it right and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about 2 months now and it works really well. I saw some reviews about the fingerprint scanner not working well, but it holds up to like 30 entries so if you do it right and register the same finger more than once, it never fails. It wasn't as big as I hoped because it doesn't fit my .44 magnum long barrel. Other than that I I like it
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Hope I never need to use this but....
customer_reviews.text: Made this purchase for the few times the Mrs. Is home alone. It was easy to program & easy to access quickly. Feel much more secure when she's home alone.
customer_reviews.author: ToolManJim

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Item has worked flawlessly for over 3 months. Plenty of room for my handgun and ammo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: Feels heavy and very durable. The lock on the inside is bigger and seems more secure than most similar safes. The fingerprint scanner works quickly and accurately. Light inside makes access in the dark easy and battery life indicator makes me confident it will work. Great great product for price.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra G.

customer_reviews.title: Bad fingerprint sensor
customer_reviews.text: The safe is fine, but the biometric ID (fingerprint sensor) is almost useless. It can’t recognize your finger to literally save your life. If you buy this safe, do it because of the other features, not the biometric sensor. Too bad they can’t use the iPhone’s technology that always works.
customer_reviews.author: The Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: the scan have few defects. It works on my ...
customer_reviews.text: the scan have few defects. It works on my finger overtime but failed on my husband's finger one every other time. so he use the key pad instead. But the key pad is small and have no lights when entering it so it was hard for me to use the key pad. need improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Ai Zhou

customer_reviews.title: Quality materials and design
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this seems like a great safe. The steel is think and the gap around the door is tight (as advertised) to make it harder to pry open. The setup was easy when following the instructions. It came with bolts to attach it to the floor or wall. Any safe is only so secure but this one seems head and shoulders above other safes in this price range. I am pleased with this purchase and will strongly consider this brand if I need another safe in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up. Programming the finger print scan and pin codes were not difficult. I was pleasantly surprised that the batteries needed were even included. It has opened every time I've attempted the fingerprint scan. Especially like the hidden key lock feature. Bought two one for upstairs, one for downstairs to keep the handguns out of reach of the grandchildren. Would highly recommend this product. After months of searching finally settled on this safe because our son in law bought one of these and liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Sumpit

customer_reviews.title: I programmed my finger in 25 different positions and still ...
customer_reviews.text: I programmed my finger in 25 different positions and still too many failures of biometric sensor to read my fingerprint. In addition, when the sensor is able to read, it takes too long to open the safe.
customer_reviews.author: JRM II

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Exceded my expectations. I did a lot of research and decided on this safe. I was not disappointed, it’s even better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin N

customer_reviews.title: Safe is sturdy, and does finger print scanning very well
customer_reviews.text: Safe is sturdy, and does finger print scanning very well. And I am 60 and it reads my finger prints, and my wife, same age also. But when it doesn't, it has key pad which works. A+
customer_reviews.author: Gary Chater

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, fulfills our needs perfectly. Would definitely buy another if we ever needed one.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Hemmers

customer_reviews.title: Great value, poor fire.
customer_reviews.text: Great safe but would have been nice to see some fire resistance. Nothing would survive a fire in the safe. Overall great value
customer_reviews.author: Dijhili

customer_reviews.title: with easy access.
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my 88 yo Dad. He loves it...consolidated all his valuables and pistols into central, secure location, with easy access.
customer_reviews.author: pmhdmh

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had to dremel lock holes for safe to lock but all else appear good
customer_reviews.author: Patti Galindo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!! I My wife and I registered several ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!!I My wife and I registered several prints on both hands and the safe works flawlessly. Excellent quality and well made. Perfect for mounting under your bed concealed storage or in a closet on a shelf. Mine is on a shelf in the closet!! Room for two Glocks and other items needing to be locked up.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: The interior light which is operated when the door opens and closes is a great add-on. The safe is used to secure a ...
customer_reviews.text: Since I've had the safe I've opened it many times using the keypad and fingerprint scanner. Lately I've been using the scanner, with it opening every time. Door seals tight, without any play. The interior light which is operated when the door opens and closes is a great add-on. The safe is used to secure a handgun and ammo. More than enough room for a 2nd handgun. Very pleased with the safe.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Maher

customer_reviews.title: Great safe, easy set up.
customer_reviews.text: Great safe, easy to set up, looks and feels well build, finger print work fine, nice interior design, very spacious.
customer_reviews.author: Lili C 77

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!!
customer_reviews.text: This safe works great and it is pretty easy to record different fingerprints. Also, I love the light that comes on when the door opens.
customer_reviews.author: SDW

customer_reviews.title: I'll buy another one
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid safe. room for a Beretta 92 and 6 mags plus a flash light, wallet, passport and some cash. Easy to open when you need quick access.
customer_reviews.author: Oldfartacus

customer_reviews.title: Need English Instructions!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great safe with a lot of options for entry and mounting. The only problem we had was that the instructions were in another language. Viking sent me an email with a manual to download in English - -you will definitely need to do this! Setting the fingerprints and codes are a little tricky without instructions. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Rosson

customer_reviews.title: Objective and neutral review.
customer_reviews.text: This is better quality than any others in this price range, however it could use some improvements. The door is not completely flush with the door opening and the display needs to be backlit. Other than that it is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: David Michael Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Great safe, comes with mounting hardware. But included shelf is no good
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, and strong. I feel like this safe won't be broken into or stolen easily. The biometric reader is fast and I have yet to max out the number of finger prints that I can add. However the shelf is flimsy and seems out of place with such a great safe.
customer_reviews.author: Clay D. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great safe, however watch out for when batteries get ...
customer_reviews.text: Great safe, however watch out for when batteries get low as locking mechanism seems to not be reliable. I was able to open/close with only hitting * key in between moments where it no longer responded (due to low battery). Replaced with named brand batteries and it was back to normal operation. Also ensure you use a lot of available print reads on single finger for different placement/pressure when needing to open in a jam.
customer_reviews.author: Garett Greenhalgh

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and finish.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and finish. Much nicer than the Barska that I returned to get this. Fast and reliable fingerprint reader
customer_reviews.author: Btongue

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! I couldn't ask for better. Everything works perfectly, and the inside light is very practical.
customer_reviews.author: Leo M

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Really poor product does not work and is using very crappy material
customer_reviews.author: H1

customer_reviews.title: Great safe... to keep you safe.
customer_reviews.text: I love this is safe! The finger print has worked every time for me, which is great so my children cant get it in and also for quick access if we have an intruder. If your thinking about getting a biometric safe, get this one!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J Boggs

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased several other brands and by far the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several other brands and by far the quality of this safe far exceeds even pricier safes. Very well made with clean welds
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent safe that works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Excellent safe that fits well where we wanted to place it. Quality construction.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: It is great. It is strong
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for a couple months now. It is great. It is strong, much more difficult to break into than some other safes. The biometric fingerprint scanner is fantastic. It works pretty much every single time. Every once in a while it will not work but usually when I my finger is at a weird angle. It is easy to program and the 3 methods of entry are nice. It is reliable and opens quickly. The light on the inside works well and is useful if you ever needed to access your weapon quickly at night. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Brown

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This is a VERY well made safe. The initial set up for finger prints is easy. It wouldn't be easy to pry it open. It provides a great place to store a fire arm or three, extra clips, ammo boxes. However, this safe does not block out humidity or moisture but will prevent children from having access to it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

product_meta.title: Viking Security Safe VS-25BL Biometric Safe Fingerprint Safe
product_meta.description:
Color:blackFast. Secure. Reliable. VS-25BL safe makes keys the thing of the past. 
VS-25BL Biometric Fingerprint Safe is made of solid one-piece steel. It offers top of the line combination Fingerprint Reader - 500 DPI optical sensor, Digital Keypad and LCD display. Its Motorized deadbolt locking system is reinforced by two insertion slots for added security. It opens in less than a second with your fingerprint or a PIN code, or a key. It can operate either with sound or in silent mode, but if you leave it unlocked Warning beep will sound. It has one fully adjustable shelf; carpeted interior, integrated LED light for additional convenience. Its size gives you extreme flexibility to mount it almost anywhere you need protection for your valuables, fire arm, documents, media, etc. 
FEATURES: 
Made of solid one-piece steel 
Optical Fingerprint Sensor - 500 DPI 
Motorized deadbolt locking system with two incretion slots 
Digital Keypad LCD displays operations and battery status 
Door Thickness: 5 mm 
Body Thickness: 2 mm 
Overall External Dimensions: H 10” x W 14” x D 10” 
Overall Internal Dimensions: H 9 ½” x W 13 ½ x D 8 ½” 
PIN code consists of 4-8 programmable digits 
Biometric Fingerprint Reader stores up to 32 fingerprints 
Sound On/Off programmable 
Warning beeps if door is unlocked for more than a minute. 
Four prong, override cross keys. (2 included) 
Pry-resistant 
Fully carpeted interior 
Fully adjustable shelf 
Build in LED light with 2 AA batteries (included) 
Time out period after 5 incorrect PINs or 10 incorrect fingerprints attempts. 
4 pre-drilled holes with anchor bolts (included) 
Requires 4 AA batteries (included) 
Weight: 27 lbs.; 11 kg
feature_bullets: HIGHTLY SECURE 10” x 14” x 10” BIOMETRIC FINGERPRINT SAFE - Unlocks Fast by Registered Fingerprint or PIN Code.

FAST ACCESS PERSONAL SAFE FOR HOME & OFFICE DEFENCE AND PROTECTION – Upgraded 500 DPI Optical Sensor, Motorized 20mm deadbolt locking mechanism with 2 pry-resistant insertion slots, 5mm door, Seamless Laser Cut, Four Prong Backup Cross Key

EASY TO SET UP & SIMPLE TO USE - Scan & Save up to 32 Fingerprints for Multiple People or 1 PIN Code, All Carpeted interior with Build in LED Light, 1 FULLY ADJUSTABLE shelf to organize your handguns, Jewelry, Cash, Small Electronics & Important Documents

PRY-RESISTANT by DESIGN, TIGHTLY SEALED SOLID STEEL BODY GUN SAFE - Two 20 mm Solid Steel Locking bars go inside of 2 insertion slots in the frame of the safe, Sound On/Off so that intruders won't hear you, Warning beep if door left unlocked
MODERN DESIGN, ROBUST MILITARY LOOK AND VERSATILE SIZE fits perfectly as a home safe, office safe, bedroom safe, or anywhere you need fast access and protection.
